00032 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00033 class Source_Fluide_Dilatable_Face
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   DoubleTab& ajouter_impl(DoubleTab& ) const;
00037   void contribuer_a_avec_impl(const DoubleTab&, Matrice_Morse&) const;
00038 protected:
00039   DoubleTab& ajouter_mere_impl(DoubleTab& ) const;
00040   const Milieu_base& milieu_impl() const;

00044  * CRTP PATTERN SUITE AU BRICOLAGE POUR QUE CHECK_SOURCES ET VERIFIE_PERE MARCHENT ... DESOLEE ...

00047 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00048 DoubleTab& Source_Fluide_Dilatable_Face<DERIVED_T>::ajouter_mere_impl(DoubleTab& resu) const
00049 {
00050   return static_cast<const DERIVED_T *>(this)->ajouter_mere(resu);
00051 }
00052 
00053 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00054 const Milieu_base& Source_Fluide_Dilatable_Face<DERIVED_T>::milieu_impl() const
00055 {
00056   return static_cast<const DERIVED_T *>(this)->equation().milieu();
00057 }
00058 
00059 /* Class template specializations */
00060 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00061 DoubleTab& Source_Fluide_Dilatable_Face<DERIVED_T>::ajouter_impl(DoubleTab& resu ) const
00062 {
00063   DoubleTrav trav(resu);
00064   ajouter_mere_impl(trav);
00065   multiplier_par_rho_si_dilatable(trav,milieu_impl());
00066   resu+=trav;
00067   return resu;
00068 }
00069 
00070 template <typename DERIVED_T>
00071 void Source_Fluide_Dilatable_Face<DERIVED_T>::contribuer_a_avec_impl(const DoubleTab& present, Matrice_Morse& matrice) const
00072 {
00073 
00074   return; /* on ne fait rien pour l'instant ... */
00075 
00076   DoubleTrav toto(present);
00077   ajouter_impl(toto);
00078   int nb_comp=toto.dimension(1);
00079   for (int i=0; i < toto.dimension(0); i++)
00080     for (int comp=0; comp<nb_comp; comp++)
00081       {
00082         if (present(i,comp)!=0)
00083           {
00084             int i0 = i * nb_comp + comp;
00085             matrice(i0,i0) -= toto(i,comp) / present(i,comp);
00086           }
00087       }
00088 }
